Malicious links, fake engagement, or repetitive replies
You are aware that it breaks specific rules
The issue does not fit into other categories
Are there any posts that back up this report?
Is there anything else we should know?
Thanks for reporting, we’ll look into this.
While we review this, you can take action against %s:
You will not see their posts. They can still follow you and see your posts and will not know that they are muted.
You will not see their posts. They will not be able to see your posts or follow you. They will be able to tell that they are blocked.
Here are your options for controlling what you see on Mastodon:
By continuing, you agree to follow by the following rules set and enforced by the %s moderators.
Tap the link we sent you to verify %s. We’ll wait right here.
Type or paste what’s on your mind

File %1$s exceeds the size limit of %2$s MB
The author marked this media as sensitive.
Why do you want to join?
This will help us review your application.
The app needs access to your storage to save this file.
There’s no app to handle this action
These are the posts gaining traction across Mastodon.
These are the news stories getting talked about on Mastodon.
These are all the posts from all users in your server (%s).
You might like these accounts based on others you follow.

Although the Mastodon app does not collect any data, the server you sign up through may have a different policy.\n\nIf you disagree with the policy for %s, you can go back and pick a different server.
This server does not accept new registrations.
Log in with the server where you created your account.
You can always complete this later in the Profile tab.
TL;DR: We don’t collect or process anything.
%1$s doesn’t allow signups from %2$s. Try a different one or pick a different server.
Mastodon is a decentralized social network, meaning no single company controls it. It’s made up of many independently-run servers, all connected together.
Every Mastodon account is hosted on a server — each with its own values, rules, & admins. No matter which one you pick, you can follow and interact with people on any server.
This link is not supported in the app

Alt text provides image descriptions for people with vision impairments, low-bandwidth connections, or those seeking extra context.

You can improve accessibility and understanding for everyone by writing clear, concise, and objective alt text.


Capture important elements

Summarize text in images

Use regular sentence structure

Avoid redundant information

Focus on trends and key findings in complex visuals (like diagrams or maps)
Could not find anything for these search terms
The account is from another server. Send an anonymized copy of this report there as well?
To not see their posts in your home feed anymore, unfollow them.
You’ve already blocked this user, so there’s nothing else you need to do while we review your report.
You’ve already blocked this user, so there’s nothing else you need to do.\n\nThanks for helping keep Mastodon a safe place for everyone!
Turn on notifications from your device settings to see updates from anywhere.
Cover up media marked as sensitive

resources.string: Still show posts that match this filter, but behind a content warning
This filter will be deleted from your account on all your devices.
Words are case-insensitive and match full words only.\n\nIf you filter the keyword “Apple,” it will hide posts containing “apple” or “aPpLe” but not “pineapple.”
Translation failed. Maybe the administrator has not enabled translations on this server or this server is running an older version of Mastodon where translations are not yet supported.
Feature profile and posts in discovery algorithms
Include public posts in search results
If someone is on this list, hide them in your Following timeline to avoid seeing their posts twice.
Keep up with interests by following hashtags
Organize your home feed with Lists
Looks like you’re about to reply to someone who isn’t a mutual connection yet. Let’s make a great first impression.
You can still reply, but it may no longer be relevant.
Ensure your reply is courteous and on-topic.
A positive tone is always appreciated.
Everyone’s conversation style is unique. Be ready to adapt.

When you opt into discoverability on Mastodon, your posts may appear in search results and trending.

Your profile may be suggested to people with similar interests to you.

Opting out does not hide your profile if someone searches for you by name.
You curate your own home feed. The more people you follow, the more active and interesting it will be.

The invite link for %1$s in your clipboard has expired and cannot be used to sign up.\n\nYou can request a new link from an existing user, sign up through %2$s, or pick another server to sign up through.

The invite link for %1$s in your clipboard is not valid and cannot be used to sign up.\n\nYou can request a new link from an existing user, sign up through %2$s, or pick another server to sign up through.
This invite link is not valid.
To join %s, you’ll need an invite link from an existing user.
They won’t know they’ve been muted.
They can still see your posts, but you won’t see theirs.
You won’t see posts that mention them.
They can mention and follow you, but you won’t see them.
They can see that they’re blocked.
They can’t see your posts and you won’t see theirs.
They can’t mention or follow you.
You won’t see posts or notifications from users on this server.
You won’t see any posts from users on this server.
Nobody from this server can follow you.
People from this server can interact with your old posts.
Their unique identifier on their server. It’s possible to find users with the same username on different servers.
Your unique identifier on this server. It’s possible to find users with the same username on different servers.
Their digital home, where all of their posts live.
Since handles say who someone is and where they are, you can interact with people across the social web of ActivityPub-powered platforms.
Your digital home, where all of your posts live. Don’t like this one? Transfer servers at any time and bring your followers, too.
Because your handle says who you are and where you are, people can interact with you across the social web of ActivityPub-powered platforms.
ActivityPub is like the language Mastodon speaks with other social networks.\n\nIt lets you connect and interact with people not just on Mastodon, but across different social apps too.
You’ll get notifications for new posts.
You’ll no longer get notifications for new posts.
Including people who have been following you fewer than 3 days
Filtered unless it’s in reply to your own mention or if you follow the sender
%s will now appear in your notification list.
Hidden from Mastodon search results, trending, and public timelines
Couldn’t reach the server. Check your connection and try again?
The request timed out. Check your connection and try again?
Something went wrong talking with your server. It’s probably not your fault. Try again?
It could’ve been deleted, or maybe it never existed at all.
This username is taken. Try a different one or pick a different server.
That doesn’t look like a valid email address.
Email address is already in use. Did you forget your password?
You should receive an email confirming your donation soon.
We are sorry, an error occurred and we have not been able to process your donation.\n\nPlease retry in a few minutes.

You have blocked %1$s, removing %2$,d of your followers and %3$s you follow.
Your account has received a moderation warning.
Some of your posts have been marked as sensitive.
Some of your posts have been removed.
Your posts will be marked as sensitive from now on.
Your saved posts are only visible to you.

resources.string: Password should be at least 8 characters.
You believe it violates the law of your or the server\'s country
We have to make sure you’re at least %s to use Mastodon. This won’t get stored after signup.
On Mastodon, you can control whether someone can quote you. This post is pending while we’re getting the original author’s approval.
Control who can interact with this post. Global settings can be found under Settings > %s > Posting defaults.
When people quote you, their post will also be hidden from trending timelines.
Follower-only posts authored on Mastodon can\'t be quoted by others.
Private mentions authored on Mastodon can\'t be quoted by others.
Published posts cannot change their visibility.
You are not allowed to quote this post
Only followers can quote this post
When quoting a quiet public post, your post will be hidden from trending timelines.
